The milky formula contains Vitamin B12 and niacinamide to leave skin bright and clear. Suitable for all skin types including sensitive and dry skin. After cleansing and toning, apply a proper amount onto face and gently pat skin to aid absorption.

name: Beauty of Joseon - Relief Sun
editors_note: Fitted with broad-spectrum SPF 50+ PA++++ to fend off UVA and UVB rays, this organic sunscreen comes in a lightweight cream texture that absorbs quickly into skin without leaving a white cast. Formulated without oxybenzone, octinoxate and animal-derived ingredients, the Relief Sun is suitable for sensitive skin.

name: Beauty of Joseon - Green Plum Refreshing Toner: AHA + BHA
editors_note: Enriched with 25% green plum water, 2% glycolic acid (a kind of AHA) and 0.5% salicylic acid (a kind of BHA), this toner gently sloughs off dead skin cells and impurities with microbubbles while keeping skin soft, plump and radiant with rice bran water and honey extract. It also contains 2% mung bean extract, as well as portulaca oleracea extract to soothe skin, control sebum secretion and tighten pores for a more refined complexion.

benefits: Renewed version of Green Plum AHA Bubble Toner.Daily exfoliating toner that contains 25% Green Plum Water and 2% Mung Bean Extract to restore refined, clear skin .2% AHA & 0.5% BHA content mildly removes dead skin cells and skin impurities in pores without irritating skin.Soothes sensitive skin and replenishes ample moisture for hydrated, healthy skin.Effectively smoothens skin to promote the rapid absorption for the following skin care steps.

Enriched with 68% centella asiatica extract, the lightweight and fast-absorbing formula fights against external aggressors while soothing and hydrating skin.

The lightweight texture adheres well onto the skin without a sticky after-feel.

name: COSRX - Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Power Essence
editors_note: Containing as much as 96% snail secretion filtrate, the advanced snail mucin essence from Korean beauty favorite COSRX adds intense moisture to hydrate skin while helping to repair damaged skin, reduce redness, and improve skin texture and pigmentation. A popular ingredient in any Korean skin care routine, snail slime is known to benefit aging skin and soften the appearance of fine lines. Its moisturizing and healing properties also make it great to use in combination with retinol or Vitamin C serums. Other key ingredients in this COSRX snail essence include sodium hyaluronate, allantoin, panthenol and arginine, which provide additional hydrating and elasticity-enhancing effects. Suitable for various skin types, including normal skin, oily skin and sensitive skin.
ingredients: Snail Secretion Filtrate, Betaine, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Polyacrylate, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Allantoin, Ethyl Hexanediol, Carbomer, Panthenol, Arginine
benefits: About brand: COSRXCOSRX utilizes its 10 years of experience to continuously deliver functional, ingredient-rich cosmetics. The brand takes its name from the word "cosmetics" and the symbol "RX" (denoting "prescription") to affirm its commitment to creating effective, affordable and skin-friendly products. COSRX is known for its short ingredients list that features high quality and effective extracts and compounds that help trouble-prone, dry and dehydrated skin, as well as aging and sensitive skin. All COSRX products are 100% made in Korea and cruelty-free. ETUDE prides itself on playful makeup, especially lip tints like the Dear Darling Water Gel Tint and eye makeup like the Play Color Eyes eye shadows and Drawing Eye Brow liners. In skin care, ETUDE is known for the Moistful Collagen line and the Soon Jung line, which includes the 2x Barrier Intensive Cream and pH 5.5 Relief Toner for sensitive skin. The brand also has an impressive collection of hand, body and foot care products, not to mention hair and makeup tools in adorable designs. Products from ETUDE are made in Korea with the exception of some of its eyebrow pencils, accessories, beauty tools and nail products. YesStyle is an authorized retailer of ETUDE. 95.8%  12879YesStyle is an authorized retailer of ETUDE.

benefits: About brand: NEOGENUsing biotechnology to enhance the benefits of natural ingredients, NEOGEN creates multifunctional skin care and cosmetics for optimal results in a simplified regimen. The Korean skin care brand's most famous line is NEOGEN Dermalogy, which specializes in innovative daily skin care products for different skin types. NEOGEN Dermalogy features the Real Ferment, Real Fresh, Real Vita, Real Cica, Probiotics and A-Clear collections, as well as the cult favorite Bio-Peel Gauze Peeling pads that gently exfoliate skin. Bestselling NEOGEN products include the Real Ferment Micro Essence, Probiotics Double Action Serum, Day-Light Protection Airy Sunscreen and Vita Duo Cream Joan Day Joan Night. name: PURITO - Daily Go-To Sunscreen
editors_note: Stay safe in the sun with this hybrid sunscreen from Korean skin care brand PURITO composed of chemical and physical filters to provide broad-spectrum sun protection of SPF 50+ PA++++. Highly blendable formula melts onto skin upon application, leaving a sheer and natural finish with no white cast. Its lightweight texture also makes it easy to re-apply even when you're wearing makeup. The unscented product is infused with centella asiatica extract and madecassoside to further soothe and protect sun-irritated skin. It's made free of paraben, fragrance and mineral oil. Suitable for any skin type including combination skin, oily skin and sensitive skin.
